Key Match Events: Dalton Knecht drilled a three-pointer over Bol Bol with 4.8 seconds remaining to tie the score at 113-113
Pre-Game Insights: Mike Budenholzer confirmed Jusuf Nurkic would make his lone preseason appearance while Grayson Allen would miss the finale. LeBron James was rested for the Lakers.
Post-Match Reflections: The Suns will begin their regular season on Oct. 23 against the Los Angeles Clippers.
Others: The Lakers carried a 35-30 lead into the second quarter after a strong effort from three-point land that saw eight of fifteen shots connect. Anthony Davis led all scorers with 15 points to pair with five rebounds after the opening 12 minutes. For the Suns, the big three of Kevin Durant (5), Bradley Beal (5) and Devin Booker (9) all finished with 5+ points.
